What You'll Do There are early Buddhist sites in cultural heartland of Bumthang Dzongkhag also including the undisturbed traditional Tibetan-style culture. Bhutan is a country of too many surprises. Its not only a country of sanity, rather it has other worldly hermits. Bhutan teaches you charm and studying of another way of living, an alternative view of what is truly necessary and important in life.
